Package particlesim

Interface Summary
ICalculate Interface for calculating particle characteristic values, and for calculating particle movements based on these values.
ICharacteristic Interface for a single particle characteristic.
ICharacteristicType Interface for the CharacteristicType class.
ICollisionDetector Interface for partical collisionDetection for difference types particle in different mediums
IMedium Interface for the Medium class.
IParticle Interface for the Particle class.
IParticleSize  
 

Class Summary
CalculateCharged Prototype class for performing calculations on simple charged particles in open space, with no medium.
CalculateElecFieldParticle Class for performing calculations on particles charged by an electric field
Characteristic Implementation of the ICharacteristic interface.
CharacteristicType Implementation of the CharacteristicType interface.
ChargedCollisionDetector This class will check collisoin particle between particle and particle between boundery.
ChargedParticle An implementation of the Particle interface for a simple charged particle.
DrawParticles This class handles drawing an array of IParticle onto the GL panel.
ElecFieldCollisiondetector  
ElecFieldParticle An implementation of the IParticle interface for a particle affected by electric fields
Formula  
GridSelector The purpose of this class is to break a rectangular area into sectors of a given size.
Matrix  
Medium The medium in which a particle exists.
ParticleLogger This class is used for persisting simple particle data to disk.
ParticleSimAboutBox A simple about box.
ParticleSimApp The main class of the application.
ParticleSimView The application's main frame.
ParticleSizeEllipse
